topics.puppetmaster: Allows spectators to control units and paste new units.
topics.puppetmaster keys: Special keybinds can be changed in settings while in game. defaults: toggle master mode: atl+ctrl+shift+p, paste unit: ctrl+v, paste ten: shift+ctrl+v
topics.pasting units: Select a player and a unit in the extra panels. Paste a unit at the cursor (default ctrl+v) or ten (default shift+ctrl+v)
